alert.note: Alert for Mason (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 1:51PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Meigs, southeastern Perry, Gallia, western Washington, southeastern Jackson, Morgan, eastern Vinton, Athens, north central Lawrence and northwestern Mason Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 150 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Nelsonville to South Webster. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Athens, Jackson, Wellston, Nelsonville, Point Pleasant, Gallipolis, Pomeroy, Glouster, McConnelsville, Mcarthur, Oak Hill, Beverly, Rio Grande, Albany, Shawnee, Coolville, Rutland, Chesterhill, Lake Hope State Park, and New Haven. This includes Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 14 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
